content.title: Text Type
content.content:
The `text` type is designed to store relatively short, **single-line unformatted strings** â€” such as titles, labels, names, or short sentences.
For longer blocks of text, or for formatted/styled content, it is highly recommended to use the `rich-text` type instead.

Defining a `text` field in your content schema is straightforward. Simply declare it like this:

```yaml
fields:
  - name: tier
    label: Tier Name
    description: A catchy name for the sponsor tier.
    type: text
    required: true
```
